formerly [[Fujikawa Industries (Earth-616)|Fujikawa Industries]] | Enemies = | Origin = [[Stark Industries (Earth-616)|Stark Industries]]' Board of Directors | PlaceOfFormation = [[Stark Enterprises Main Plant|Stark Industries]], [[Flushing]], [[Queens]], [[Long Island]], [[New York (State)|New York]] | PlaceOfDissolution = | Creators = | First = Iron Man Vol 1 45 | Last = Invincible Iron Man Vol 1 594 | HistoryText = The '''[[Stark Industries (Earth-616)|Stark Industries]] Board of Directors''', also known as '''Stark Enterprises Board of Directors''' and '''Stark International Board of Directors''', is the shareholders committee which oversees the activities and the management of the multinational corporation currently known as '''Stark Industries'''. The last Chairman of the Board was Stark Industries' Chief Executive Officer{{r|Invincible Iron Man Vol 4 3}} [[Eric Lynch (Earth-616)|Eric Lynch]].{{r|Invincible Iron Man #593}} It can be presumed that since Tony Stark replaced Stark Industries with a new enterprise [[Stark Unlimited (Earth-616)|Stark Unlimited]],{{r|Tony Stark: Iron Man Vol 1 1}} the board of directors of Stark Industries was dissolved. ===Chairman of the Board=== Chairman of Stark Industries' Board of Directors, listed in chronological order: ====Stark Industries / Stark International==== * [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Tony Stark]]{{r|Iron Man #48|; [[Simon Gilbert (Earth-616)|Simon Gilbert]] mentions how he obtained the Chairman position from Tony Stark.}} * [[Simon Gilbert (Earth-616)|Simon Gilbert]]{{r|Iron Man #45}} * [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Tony Stark]]{{r|Iron Man #48|49}} ====Stark Enterprises==== * [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Tony Stark]]{{r|Iron Man #328}} ====Stark Industries / Stark International / Stark Enterprises==== * [[Eric Lynch (Earth-616)|Eric Lynch]]{{r|Invincible Iron Man #593}} | Equipment = | Transportation = | Weapons = | Notes = * Acting Stark Industries' President [[Amanda Armstrong (Earth-616)|Amanda Armstrong]], left in charge by former President and founder [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Tony Stark]],{{r|Invincible Iron Man Vol 4 3}} didn't have a seat at the Board of Directors.{{r|Invincible Iron Man #594}} | Trivia = | Links = }}
